text: My daughter has attended 4 lesson in this Tuition Center. She is always excited to attend and happy when she go back home. The teaching model is fun & engaging. They ensure that Kids are focus to learning while having fun. Thanks to Teacher Joan for all the guidance specially during PSLE.

Thank u Teacher Joanne for her patience and motherly love towards my son. My son has dyslexia and thus needed more patience in teaching him especially for Chinese.

Teacher Joanne has her ways to capture his attention and promote his interest in this subject. If you looking for a caring and patience teacher then I would recommend Teacher Joanne.

Teachers Joanne go above and beyond to help students.Teachers Joanne is an amazing teacher, She's understanding, kind and caring. She always finds ways to bring out the joy in learning and help students understand in ways that suits them.
I really enjoyed Teacher Jia en teaching me as she is very patient, enjoyableto be around and I actually learned something from the class
I was able to improve my subjects and I even could get good marks for my PSLE from the help of Teacher Joanne ;D
